fulltext:
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
ANKUR GAUR 
+84-889423817 
+91-9818019231 
nkrgaur26@gmail.com  
EMPLOYMENT 
WeCash Vietnam (Sep’18-Present) 
Product Manager 
• Led Concept to Launch for Bagang micro lending platform $50-$200; 10/20/30 days micro loans with 2 BA, 5 
Dev & 3 member Design team 
• Scaled to 2500 applications per day with 4.3 average rating on Play Store. Best Rank - #4 in Finance VN 
• Integrated AM (AI modeler) to reduce underwriting operations effort by 45%. Underwriting time reduced 
from 2 days to 12 hours. 
• +10% Conversion KYC to Loan Application Initiation with targeted campaigns with 3% more submissions 
• Integrated National credit check to reduce risk by reducing underwriting time by 25%  
• Integrated MoMo, biggest e-Wallet in VN, accounting for 51% of total repayments leading to 9% reduction in 
First Payment Default. 
• Ran A/B testing experiments with National ID OCR and Face match, reducing IA effort by 30% 
• Integrated attachments and push notifications with in-app support chat, reducing turn-around-time by 50% 
Kickstart Jobs (Sep’17- Jul’18) 
Product Manager 
• Drove 2X Repeat by implementing Context Based Notifications, Task based (Uber like system) with 50% rise 
in fulfillment 
• Led implementation of Pricing Engine with Subscriptions model (Monthly, Quarterly & Yearly) for better 
demand prediction and increased retention 
• Optimized operations with dashboards, reducing onboarding time for new users from 5 days to 1 day 
Ridely.co (Oct’15-Mar’17) 
Co-Founder 
• Concept-Design-Dev-Launch Ridely Android app, P2P ridesharing with realtime scheduling and route selection 
• Led Scheduled rides project based on customer feedback leading to 3x repeat rides 
• Managed a team of 3 developers building iOS application, website 
Jabong (Jun’14-Oct’15) 
Software Engineer 
• Part of the architecture team, led the migration of Cart and Shortlist monolithic to Golang microservices 
• Developed Multi-device login session to support web, iOS, Android users to login at the same time 
• Owned and Developed URL shortener, BI-tools chrome extension, Deeplinking, MI report automation 
EDUCATION 
Bharati Vidyapeeth’s College of Engg. 
New Delhi 
Aug, 2010-Jun, 2014 
• B.Tech Computer Science Engineering. Overall - 79% 
• Implemented OS VM (similar to AWS EC2) using open source technologies - Nimbus, Xen, Open Stack Swift. 
TECHNICAL EXPERIENCE 
Projects  
• EaseYourBiz (2016) - Designed and Developed Android app for an Employee Management Suite. 
• SkillBlade (2016) - Developed during a hackathon, a skills marketplace to find and match mentors with similar 
skillset. 
SKILLS 
• Technical Skills: Strategy, UI/UX design, SQL, Analytics, Documentation 
• Programming Skills: Android, Java, Go-lang, PHP, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis 
• Soft Skills: Leadership, Communication, Organization 
EXTRA CURRICULAR AND AWARDS 
• One Act Play: Won runner-up prize in a play about Chanakya (an ancient teacher, philosopher, royal advisor) 
• Ping Pong: Participated in Inter-state competitions representing the high-school team

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
